name: WALK MAN GAME
description:
FIRST UNITY GAME WITH PROPER C# CODING IVE MADE! IVE BEEN USING C# FOR LESS THAN A MONTH NOW SO IT COULD USE SOME IMPROVEMENTS BUT IM STILL WORKING ON MAKING IT BETTER.

WITH FAST PACED GAMEPLAY DANCING AND MORE THIS WILL BE AN UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER (NOT REALLY ITS JUST ANOTHER GENERIC SANDBOX GAME)

CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACE - SPAWN RAGDOLL

Z - DANCE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
